Product Description

Our Brand

COVFEVER — Focus on Holiday Lighted Display

For the coming Christmas Day, COVFEVER launch out new styles of lighted gift box! It could be put on porch, window sill, table and any places in your house. It symbolizes gift and best wishes for New Year!

Xmas Lighted Gift Box

Specification

Box Number: 3 boxes in one set

Power Souce: Battery oprated

Light Color: cool white

Size: 7.67×7.67*7.11 inch, 6.9×6.9×6.9 inch, 4.13×4.13×4.13 inch

Wide Usage Desk Porch Window sill Under tree

Firework Lighted Gift Box

Specification

Box Number: 3 boxes in one set

Power Souce: Battery oprated

Light Color: cool white

Size: 7.67×7.67*7.11 inch, 6.9×6.9×6.9 inch, 4.13×4.13×4.13 inch

Set of 3 Red Green Yellow Christmas Lighted Gift Box

Specification

Box Number: 3 boxes in one set

Power Souce: Battery oprated

Light Color: Red Green Yellow

Size: 7.67×7.67*7.11 inch, 6.9×6.9×6.9 inch, 4.13×4.13×4.13 inch

Why Choose Us

Patriotic Decoration

The pattern is full of American classical elements. Lighted box could decorate your house day and night and make your home full of Memorial Day atmosphere!

Waterproof

Our light up decoration boxes are waterproof, which means you could decorate your yard with it. Please note to move it to house when big rain & strong wind.

8 Lighting Modes & Auto-Timer

Our pathway lights are with 8 modes lighting and auto-time. You could choose the mode you perfer and it will light up for 8 hours and turn off 16 hours automaticly.

【Auto-Timer】It will light up for 6 hours on and 18 hours off automatically. The lighted gift boxes with build-in 60 LED warm white string lights brings great Christmas atmosphere.
【3 Pack Christmas Lighted Gift Boxes 】Comes with 3 different sizes boxes: large: 7.67″x7.67″x7.11″, medium: 6.9″x6.9″x6.9″, small: 4.13″x4.13″x4.13″. It can be stacked one-by-one for convenient storage and space saving.
【Battery Operated & Waterproof】Powered by 3 AA batteries(not included). Rubber Seal strip is added to our battery box, so it is waterproof. You can place it indoor and outdoor to light up your house and yard.
【Personalized Gift Boxes】Sturdy metal frame covered with classic Christmas white cotton thread. The white part decorates as snowflake on boxes. Cute decorations for the coming Christmas!
【Christmas Decor & Gifts】Great decoration for Christmas tree, table, sofa, kids room and outdoor places like yard, lawn, porch. An ideal present for kids, family, friends and Christmas party.
